row.process:
:SET &ITER# = 0
:WHILE &ITER# < &LOOP_NB# : P "Iteration : &ITER#" : P "DÃ©lai entre chaque iteration : &LOOP_DELAY# s" : WAIT &LOOP_DELAY# : P "Active l'objet" : SET &RUNID# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(JOBS.GET.TASK.SCRI, WAIT, , , , PASS_VALUES) : SET &TASK_STATE# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&RUNID#, TASK_STATE#) : SET &TASK_MESG_FAILURE# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&RUNID#, TASK_MESG_FAILURE#) : P &TASK_STATE# : P &TASK_MESG_FAILURE# : SWITCH &TASK_STATE# : CASE "SUCCEEDED" : P "TASK OK : QUIT" : STOP NOMSG, 0, "TASK SUCCEEDED" : CASE "FAILED" : P "TASK KO : QUIT" : P &TASK_MESG_FAILURE# : STOP MSG, 50, "TASK FAILED : &TASK_MESG_FAILURE#" : CASE "RUNNING" : P "TASK RUNNING : CONTINUE" : ENDSWITCH : SET &ITER# = &ITER# + 1 :ENDWHILE
!:STOP MSG, 51, "Nombre d'essai max atteint &ITER#" :EXIT 10
! ! :WAIT 10 ! ! : SET &RUNID# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(JOBS.GET.TASK.SCRI,,,,,PASS_VALUES) ! :SET &RUNID# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(JOBS.GET.TASK.SCRI, WAIT, , , , PASS_VALUES) ! :SET &TASK_STATE# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&RUNID#, TASK_STATE#) ! :SET &TASK_MESG_FAILURE# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&RUNID#, TASK_MESG_FAILURE#) ! ! :P &TASK_STATE# ! :P &TASK_MESG_FAILURE#
